snippet.title: Phantom Line - Official Reveal Trailer | PC Gaming Show 2024
snippet.description:
Join the paranormal SWAT. Watch the tense, creepy Phantom Line reveal trailer to see the unsettling world of this upcoming co-op (1-4) shooter set in the post-nuclear European continent. Your mission is to search and contain anomalies - paranormal activity hidden from the public eye, in an open world map full of dynamic events.

Phantom Line will be available on PC, and sign-ups are available now for early playtest coming later this summer.

#Gaming #Games #IGN
